### ITQ : Elevator Replacement - Canadian Coast Guard College
#### Issued by the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
#### Solicitation Number: WS4064483241 - Doc4064888406
#### Closing Date: July 7, 2023 at 14:00:00
___

#### Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a qualified contractor to replace the existing passenger elevator at the Canadian Coast Guard College in Sydney, Nova Scotia.

#### Scope of Work

* Remove the existing passenger elevator from the Cabot Building
* Supply and install a new elevator within the same elevator shaft
* Perform structural, mechanical, electrical, and architectural upgrades as per contract requirements

#### Evaluation Criteria

* Bidders will be evaluated based on their qualifications and prices submitted.

#### Solicitation Details
* Tender Closing Date: July 7, 2023 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: July 3, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: TBA

#### Notice and Contact Information

A notice and solicitation package are available for review on the Ariba web platform.

Note: This document does not contain any attachment or supporting documentation. It is the sole responsibility of the tenderer to contact the contracting authority for any clarifications or questions.
